name: 蔡逸萍
objective: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
schedule:
WEEK	SESSION THEME
1	Introduction
2     	Interpretation as a Profession
3     	Public speaking I/ Paraphrasing I
4     	Paraphrasing II
5    	Paraphrasing III/ Sight translation I 
6	Sight translation II 
7	Sight translation III 
8   	Sight translation IV 
9    	Mid-term
10    	Memory retention/Recall exercises I: Short CI on general topics  
11    	Memory retention/Recall exercises II: Short CI on general topics 
12   	Note-taking for CI I: Skills and strategies 
13   	Note-taking for CI II: Skills and strategies 
14   	Note-taking for CI III: Long CI on general topics
15   	Note-taking for CI IV: Long CI on general topics  
16   	Note-taking for CI V: Long CI on general topics *
17   	Wrap-up
18   	Final
	
	*More CI training shall continue in the spring term 2014
